about_the_game:
Music is the soul of Minotaur! And just like the game, this soundtrack gets longer each time a new route is released. At the moment, it includes 42 tracks from Nod and Mentor's routes - almost everything you'll hear there - in 320 kbps MP3 and 16-bit FLAC formats. All tracks have been properly tagged. Damn you, OCD... Make sure to check the folder with the files - it includes unique cover art for each disk, as well as back covers (all with and without text), wallpapers and even a small secret : ) In addition to that, bonus folder for Mentor's route includes split (individual) tracks from the longer mixes that I made for some of the scenes.

I hope you enjoy!
